# =====================================
# Unity generated files and folders
# =====================================
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
MemoryCaptures/
UserSettings/
sysinfo.txt
*.stacktrace
*.pidb
*.svd
*.opendb
*.mdb

# =====================================
# Autogenerated IDE project files
# =====================================
.vscode/
.idea/
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs

# =====================================
# Cache and build data
# =====================================
*.apk
*.aab
*.keystore
*.exe
*.dll

# =====================================
# OS-specific files
# =====================================
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# =====================================
# Unity Packages
# =====================================
*.unitypackage

# =====================================
# Shader cache
# =====================================
*.bin

# =====================================
# Rider logs
# =====================================
*.log
``
